articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: American B-1B bomber flies over Middle East amid Iran tensions - 9News
articles.description: The US Air Force flew a B-1B strategic bomber over key maritime chokepoints in the Middle East amid ongoing tensions with Iran as its nuclear deal with world powers remains in tatters.

articles.author: Patrick Reilly
articles.title: American Airlines cancels more than 1,000 flights over Halloween weekend - New York Post
articles.description: On Sunday, American Airlines canceled 19 percent of all of its planned flights that day, accounting for nearly one-third of all of the country’s cancelations.
articles.content:
American Airlines canceled over 1,000 flights over the Halloween weekend, blaming weather woes and staffing issues.
On Sunday, the airline canceled 527 total flights, or 19 percent of all of its pla… [+1404 chars]
